title: 820-2915-B, GPU Replaced but red screen in the background
message:
I replaced 820-2915's GPU, it was 005, I installed a chipset produced in 2019 reballed.
but after 3 months there is a problem of a red screen in the background but it boot and you could switch between the integrated and the AMD GPU[ATTACH alt="image_2785.jpg" type="full"]55661._xfImport[/ATTACH] with no problems

title: 820-2915-B, GPU Replaced but red screen in the background
message:
Correct background on iGPU?

What about external video?
It is always driven by AMD GPU.

title: 820-2915-B, GPU Replaced but red screen in the background
message:
It had always red screen, iGPU and AMD
I repaired it, I resoldered the lcd connector pins with a fresh solder.
The red screen was appearing suddenly, even on booting screen.
I didn't try in on extra screen

title: 820-2915-B, GPU Replaced but red screen in the background
message: Redish background on both iGPU and AMD GPU pointed to such issue as you've found...
